main.description: The specification of a resource inflow to, or outflow from, a recipe process

action.description: Relates a process input or output to a verb, such as consume, produce, work, modify, etc.

resourceQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the economic resource counted or inventoried

effortQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the work or use or citation effort-based action

recipeInputOf.description: Relates an input flow to its process in a recipe

recipeOutputOf.description: Relates an output flow to its process in a recipe

recipeClauseOf.description: Relates a flow to its exchange agreement in a recipe

state.description: The state of the desired economic resource (pass or fail), after coming out of a test or review process

resourceConformsTo.description: The primary resource specification or definition of an existing or potential economic resource

stage.description: References the ProcessSpecification of the last process the economic resource went through
